title: The Curse of Always Wanting to Improve
itunes:title: The Curse of Always Wanting to Improve
description:
Episode 491 - "I don't want to be happy with where I am because then I will lose motivation to become more" I always hear something like that from people. They think that if they allow themselves to be happy or content then they will lose all motivation. In this episode, I will teach you my strategy of positive dissatisfaction so that you can be content but always striving to achieve more! If you are ready to break out of your comfort zones, join my Iron Mind 60 challenge at www.IronMind60.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
